Subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Exception while crawling

X-Yahoo-Profile: gojomo

We recently found a workaround for this Windows-specific issue and 
applied it to the 'heritrix2' trunk in November, before the 'beta' 
release -- see issue:

   http://webteam.archive.org/jira/browse/HER-661

I've just applied it to the 'heritrix' (1.x) trunk as well, so future 
auto-builds and an eventual 1.12.2 release (not yet scheduled) will 
include the workaround.

The damage caused by the error is local: the named Extractor for that 
URL will not run, so any outlinks uniquely discoverable from that URL 
will not be crawled. If that is a concern for your crawls, you may want 
to try a TRUNK auto-build, but be aware there may be other new 
unknown/unfixed issues in such development builds.

- Gordon @ IA
